long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reabr.com is an online bookmark manager with many advanced features. You can manage your website links into boards, move them, delete them, etc. You can share boards with others or subscribe to other boards.

This extension is designed for more comfortable management of your bookmarks directly with your Google Chrome browser through side panel.

It allows you to easily and quickly insert the currently visited page into any board in your profile in the Reabr application and many others features.

Reabr extension v1.32:
With the new version comes an easy popup for quickly inserting bookmarks directly into the Reabr application.

There are functions for highlighting texts and saving together with bookmarks. Marked texts can be saved and displayed again using links in the Reabr application.

Instalation:
After adding the add-on to the Google Chrome browser, I recommend turning on the display of the icon in the browser toolbar so that you have an easy view of the sidebar.

Context menu options are also available. There you will find the option to save the page to the Reabr online bookmark manager or the text highlighting function.

Tutorials:
To learn more about the Reabr online bookmark manager app or Google Chrome browser add-on  with text highlighter, visit the Reabr blog. You can find all the necessary links directly on the Reabr boards in your profile in the application.

Feedback:
If you want to tell us your knowledge, feedback or any topics and ideas, we will be happy if you contact us.

Thank you for choosing to try Reabr
